verbose_text: Rabs cycle between a GTP bound active form and a GDP bound inactive form, and active Rabs promote membrane trafficking by recruiting specific effector molecules, including lipid kinases, phosphatases, coat adaptors, BAR proteins, kinesin motor adaptors, dynamin adaptors, myosin motors, actin regulatory proteins, tethering factors, and phospholipid binding proteins.
evidence: Rabs promote membrane trafficking by recruiting specific effector molecules, including lipid kinases, phosphatases, coat adaptors, BAR proteins, kinesin motor adaptors, dynamin adaptors, myosin motors, actin regulatory proteins, tethering factors, and phospholipid binding proteins
